name: Building For Bob
description:
Bob is a construction worker. He is a hard worker. It is lunch now, but he forgot his lunch at the top of the building, but the building is not finished yet. Help Bob get to the food, by repairing a path for him.

Made during Global Game Jam 2020 using Unreal Engine 4.


David Wise only made the original soundtrack of the game, not the songs/effects used in the memeifed version.
